project.name: C-C134A-FFMP-10-ST04-DT06-DF09-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C134A-FFMP-10-ST04-DT06-DF09-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Good inputs:1) environment variable is a string value with no formatting2) environement variable is a format string that doesn't expose application dataBad inputs:1) environment variable is a format string that exposes application data

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7902 -s 76 -m "this is a string to be printed" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C134A-FFMP-10-ST04-DT06-DF09-CF01-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: change the frame rate and aspect ration of a video Good inputs:1) environment variable is a string value with no formatting2) environement variable is a format string that doesn't expose application dataBad inputs:1) environment variable is a format string that exposes application data

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7902 -s 76 -m "$(echo c29tZSBiZW5pZ24gZm9ybWF0dGluZyBmb3IgY2hhciBzdHJpbmcgCg== | base64 --decode)" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-02-CENTOS OR GOOD-02-UBUNTU OR GOOD-02-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
